com.googlecode.cqengine.index.sqlite

Interface ConnectionManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RequestScopeConnectionManager, SimpleConnectionManager

    public interface ConnectionManager
    Connection Manager
    Author:
    Silvano Riz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Connection getConnection(Index<?> index, QueryOptions queryOptions)
      Returns a Connection.
      boolean isApplyUpdateForIndexEnabled(Index<?> index)
      Informs if index updates should be applied.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        Connection getConnection(Index<?> index,
                         QueryOptions queryOptions)
        Returns a Connection.
        Parameters:
        index - The Index requesting the connection.
        queryOptions - The query options for the request
        Returns:
        The Connection

      • isApplyUpdateForIndexEnabled

        boolean isApplyUpdateForIndexEnabled(Index<?> index)
        Informs if index updates should be applied. This is for advanced use cases only, where the application supplies a custom ConnectionManager to CQEngine.
        Parameters:
        index - The index.
        Returns:
        true if updates on the index should be applied. False otherwise.
